LanguageData.ColaBasin.label: Quantum Cola Core Machine
LanguageData.GECK.label: Garden of Eden Generator Compact
LanguageData.GECK.description: Garden of Eden Generator Compact. This is standard equipment in all Vault-Tec shelters. The GECK is the source of civilization's restoration after the bombing. Just add water and stir.
LanguageData.VaultBoyMedicine.label: Medicine Bobblehead
LanguageData.VaultBoyMedicine.description: Medicine Bobblehead - A smart person understands that the wound under the bandage is not going away.
LanguageData.VaultBoyEloquence.label: Eloquence Bobblehead
LanguageData.VaultBoyEloquence.description: Eloquence Bobblehead - I want the pen to be equal to the bayonet.
LanguageData.VaultBoyIntelligence.label: Intelligence Bobblehead
LanguageData.VaultBoyIntelligence.description: Intelligence Bobblehead - Always be ready to answer a hundred thousand why.
LanguageData.VaultBoyRepair.label: Repair Bobblehead
LanguageData.VaultBoyRepair.description: Repair Bobblehead - Why go down with the ship if you can fix it?
LanguageData.VaultBoyBarter.label: Barter Bobblehead
LanguageData.VaultBoyBarter.description: Barter Bobblehead - The amount of good you have should always increase.
